author: Vordox

text:
JEZUZ HIS FACE!
Erm, ahem...anyway...heard of the game, never played since it looked quite generic(just another Mario styled gameplay with Sonic vibe game, everyone was making them at the time).
Down to 6 guesses as to 900...FF7 Overworld, Chocobo theme, Prolgue, Victory fanfare(most likely from VI since it's the most classic & repeatedly used melody), DK theme(either DKC or possibly DKCR since it's the new one), or Earthbound's Eight Melodies. I have 10 to go, and I'm close to having a guess.
